channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:34 Close the threat of artobustril in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Salt for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 09:34 Close the threat of artobustril in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Salt for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 09:30 Alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 09:30 Alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Watch for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 09:28 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region.Cont attention, anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lypetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 游리 09:28 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region.Cont attention, anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lypetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 09:26 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 09:26 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
